name: The World Around Us
description:
A short puzzle-platformer where the world changes around the player every 10 seconds. Sometimes its gravity, others its the world itself. Get to the end in any way possible.

Controls:

Movement: ASWD / Arrows / Controller

Jump: Spacebar / A (Xbox controller) / X (PS Controller)

Reset: R / Left Bumper

Flip World (Testing): F / Y (Xbox controller) / Tri (PS Controller)

Made for Ludem Dare 51, theme "Every10 Seconds".

Known bugs/issues:

  • Player sticks to walls if moving into them
  • Sometimes the player moves too fast and goes through walls
  • Elevator not always timed properly
  • Collision with hazards based on feet, doesn't always register if body/head hit

Please let me know if any more issues are found.

Thank you.
